snippet: The chairman of the English Football Association, David Bernstein, met the news media Thursday, one day after the resignation of Fabio Capello as the coach of the national soccer team.
abstract: The chairman of the English Football Association, David Bernstein, met the news media Thursday, one day after the resignation of Fabio Capello as the coach of the national soccer team.
lead_paragraph: LONDON - At noon on Thursday, less than a day after parting with the England team manager, the Football Association chairman, David Bernstein, faced the news media.

headline.main: Chairman of English F.A. Tells His Side
